mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_no, c.m_no, c.p_id, c.cart_amount, c.po_id, p.thumb_300, p.p_name, p.p_price, po.po_value, po.po_price, po.po_stock FROM cart c join product p on c.p_id = p.p_id join product_option po on p.p_id=po.p_id WHERE m_no = #{m_no}
SELECT sum(c.cart_amount*(p.p_price+po.po_price)) FROM cart c join product p on c.p_id = p.p_id join product_option po on p.p_id=po.p_id WHERE m_no = #{m_no};

SELECT m.m_name, m_id, m_phone, c.cart_amount, p.p_name, p.p_price, po.po_value, po.po_price FROM cart c JOIN member m ON c.m_no = m.m_no JOIN product p on c.p_id = p.p_id JOIN product_option po on c.po_id = po.po_id WHERE c.cart_no =${cart_no};
